nodes.text: L5-V2 was an astromech droid that served Admiral Bey'wan Aygo of the Republic Navy aboard Carrick Station during the Galactic War with the Sith Empire.

L5-V2 appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Starfighter, a Digital Expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, as the Republic Flashpoint courier for the Kuat Drive Yards Flashpoint, though the droid is only found aboard Carrick Station and not on other planets like other couriers.
